doc.title: Crashing Hollywood
doc.plot: Crashing HOLLYWOOD is my story of going to HOLLYWOOD and trying to pitch an idea for a kids show to the major studios. Needless to say, the road was long, arduous and full of hardship. When I started this journey, I had no idea that it was not possible unless you had an agent, a lawyer or at least some vague clue of how the business of show actually works. It wasn't easy, but it was fun.
